title: What Straight Talk SIM card will work in my Google pixel 4A phone. 99 Center or the $45 one
content: I currently have a Samsung phone using Straight Talk as my provider. I was given a Google pixel 4A phone and need a SIM card. I went to the Walmart website and noticed micro SIM cards for Tracfones ranging from $0.99 to almost $95. My current TracFone plan is $45 a month which is all I need. Which SIM card will best work in my?
